private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: All counting is done locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server, ensuring complete privacy.

autoSave.title: Auto-Save Settings
autoSave.description: Your counter value and custom settings are automatically saved, so you never lose your progress.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Personalize your counter with custom increments, colors, fonts, and sizes to match your preferences.

history.title: History Tracking
history.description: Keep track of all your counting activities with timestamp history that you can review anytime.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Quick access with keyboard shortcuts for increment, decrement, and reset operations.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No limits, no subscriptions. Use unlimited counters with all customization features completely free.
